Opt for an outdoor wedding ceremony in a natural setting such as a park or beach, reducing the need for indoor spaces and electricity.
Choose sustainable materials for decorations, such as biodegradable flowers, locally-sourced wood, and recycled paper.
Serve organic, locally-sourced food and drinks to reduce the carbon footprint of transportation and packaging.
Use energy-efficient lighting and appliances, and encourage guests to carpool or use public transportation to reduce emissions.
Consider donating a portion of the wedding budget to an environmental charity or cause, such as reforestation or renewable energy initiatives.
